document.full_text: afghanistan's leader announced on tuesday seven areas would be included in the first phase of a gradual transition of security from nato troops to afghan forces in july, including volatile cities in the south and north.
document.title: afghan security transition to start in seven areas
lines_and_colors: afghanistan's leader announced on tuesday seven areas would be included in the first phase of a gradual transition of security from nato troops to afghan forces in july, including volatile cities in the south and north.
